description:
Based upon TaskMaster for webOS phones, TaskMasterHD has been rebuilt from scratch for the Touchpad. 
Get your life back in order with TaskMasterHD. Now, you can keep a better grip on your GTD lists with TaskMasterHD. TaskMasterHD gives you the functionality required for any task app, with simple interactivity to allow you to update statuses & details with minimal taps of the device. Organise your lists as you see fit, with user defined lists & categories. 

Features 
• Arrange tasks into organised user defined lists. 
• Categorise your tasks as you see fit for better visualisation. 
• Sorting facility. 
• QuickStatus allows you to change the status of tasks without editing. 
• Print both tasks and tasklists direct to printer.
• Set both due dates and reminders for any tasks.
• Assign owners to lists and tasks.
• Tasks can have costs attached.
• Tasklists can have budgets assigned.
• View by list or by due dates, categories & status.
• Simple check lists available.
• Set up tasks to recur at regular intervals.
• Favourite filter for tasks lists.
• Colour themes.
• Decide what time of the day to check for any tasks due today.
• Email facility. Both tasks and task lists can be emailed.
• Option to exclude Completed & Cancelled tasks when viewing by due dates. Defined in the preferences.
• Search feature. Search a list for text in the summary & description.
• Email facility. Both tasks and task lists can be emailed.
• "QuickList" feature to create a list of entries quickly.
versionNote: New view (panel) of pre defined reports.
